import React from 'react'; import { useLanguage } from '../contexts/LanguageContext'; import { Calendar, Clock, MapPin } from 'lucide-react'; import './Events.css'; const Events: React.FC = () => { const { t } = useLanguage(); return (

{t('community.events')}

8:30 AM

9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

); }; export default Events;
